name: Red de Monitoreo de Calidad del aire de Bogotá (RMCAB)
about: The RMCAB is made up of 13 static monitoring stations and a mobile station, located in different parts of the city, equipped with the latest technology equipment that allows continuous monitoring of the concentrations of particulate material (PM10, PST, PM2.5) , of polluting gases (SO2, NO2, CO, O3) and of the meteorological variables of precipitation, wind speed and direction, temperature, solar radiation, relative humidity and barometric pressure.
